column3: Wassup My dude! You've created an awesome game which I play every day and I LOVE! Now, ONE thing you could add is editing the amount of score you have :P Thx

I have one word to describe the game. CLICKBAIT. Here's why: #1: Not available to change the colors. #2: Not available to change the board size. #3:  The 2 1/2 block didn't work. You need to fix all of it, then I'll change my rate.
Please continue updating. This is an amazing Customizer Version of 2048, if it is just going to be left un-updated and stop in 2014, I'm going to be very sad. Really please continue this.

Truth be told I tend to be a bit of a derp at times, but I'm not seeing anything as to how to change the colour scheme, altogether a good game, but not sure if this was a promise undelivered or that I am looking in the wrong place. If I could be directed with careful instructions that even an idiot ...Full ReviewTruth be told I tend to be a bit of a derp at times, but I'm not seeing anything as to how to change the colour scheme, altogether a good game, but not sure if this was a promise undelivered or that I am looking in the wrong place. If I could be directed with careful instructions that even an idiot couldn't foul, then I'd greatly appreciate it and rate this a full 5 stars. Cheers for the mobile version though.

I absolutely love the interactivity that this game has to offer. Although I think the base number limit is high enough, I would appreciate it if you made it even higher. Other than that, I love this game.

2048, but BETTER. This app takes 2048 to the next level by allowing you to do much, much more with the board, tiles, colors and more! Perfect for when you have nothing to do or just want to challenge your brain!
Nothing than this I really love than 2048
Amazing options Whoa this is a great addition to 2048, I'm surprised only a few ppl have downloaded it!
It has many interesting options: Ability to change the probability for each number, to modify each tile's content and many undoes and redoes. All in all geeky stuff.
The controls are so difficult and all it says now is"no move available" so uninstalling
Step up from plain 2048 Custom grid choice? Best idea so far, perhaps some background images could make it better!
Get It!!!! It is so fun to mess around with all the combinations. If you like the real game you will love this game. Awesome!!!
This is great!! I love I! I always play it in different customizations and try new challenges
This is aweso!  This has all of the features you would expect.  You can edit squares.
